text: The 2008 Southland Conference Baseball Tournament was held from May 21–24. The top eight regular season finishers of the league's twelve teams met in the double-elimination tournament held at Don Sanders Stadium in Huntsville, Texas. The winner of the tournament, , earned the conference's automatic bid to the 2008 NCAA Division I Baseball Tournament. ==Seeding and format== The top eight finishers from the regular season were seeded one through eight.
